history.text: so the movie in discussion is avengers 2012
Okay, sounds interesting. What is it about?
do you guys know about this movies?
No I don't.
it is a movies about action heroes, iron man, hulk, captain America, mostly marvel characters
So they are comic book characters?
Pretty much, the movies have good ratings and enjoyable for an action movies, I would definitely recommend it.
Can you give me some examples why you recommend it?
wonder how much longer do we have to talk about this until we can finish and submit this.
Sure, the example would include:
good action scene, there is decent stories about how the avengers come together and form a team
What does the team do?
there is good action scenes from most of the character, if you like iron man, and hulk, and captain America, black widow, hawk eye, etc, you would like the movies
Are they fighting villians?
the team tries to save the world from destruction and the plot of loki to rule the earth
yes, loki
his brother thor is also in the movie
I see.  What kind of character is Loki?
he is the brother of thor, but he is adopted and he is a god with power of magic who likes to plot of ways to rule planet and universe
mischievous, tricky, kind of a magician plotter with decent combat power
So they are on Earth and not some other planet then?
the movies happen mostly on earth, so most of the action is there, though some of the scenes are on other planet
Do you know what the rating of the movie is? Would it be appropriate for children?
I would guess pg-pg 13 since there are some fight scenes, most likely appropriate for children since some of the character are based on comic books children grow up with
Well I know that Batman was a bit dark and scary.  Is this like that?
no, it is a bit lighter with some humors mixed in and a lot of actions, think iron man or superman with many more characters in one movie
Oh good I like a bit of comedy mixed in.  You mentioned fight scenes, are they gruesome or more comic book like?
comic book like, not too much blood or death, more like showcasing power of the characters and how they are known in comics
But still exciting with lots of action I hope?
yes, it is pretty exciting actually, if you ever wonder how each other character stack up against each other, the movie does show quite a few fight scene between the characters
So there isn't just one villian that the team goes against but another team of villians?
there is a main villain the team go against that is plotting to bring an alien army onto earth that the team has to go against
Oh the plot thickens...what kind of aliens?
I think I've asked all the questions I can come with...nice talking with you.
chitauri armies aliens that is given to loki by the other to take over the earth
nice talking with you

uid1response.feedback: I like action super hero movies and the other user was able to answer all of the questions I had and even seemed very enthusiastic about the movie.
